nodes.id: 中国共产主义青年团河北省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团河北省委员会

location.zh-cn: 河北省石家庄市桥西区裕华西路53号
location.en: No. 53, Yuhua West Road, Qiaoxi District, Shijiazhuang City, Hebei Province

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团在河北省的地方组织机构，接受中国共产党河北省委员会和中国共产主义青年团中央委员会的领导，主要负责青年工作。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Youth League of China in Hebei Province, under the leadership of the Hebei Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China and the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China, mainly responsible for youth work.

nodes.id: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Youth League of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党河北省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党河北省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在河北省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Hebei Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，根据文本内容，其为时任中国共产主义青年团河北省委员会书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who, according to the text, was the incumbent Secretary of the Hebei Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League of China.

nodes.id: 2023年河北共青团救灾照片争议事件

zh-cn: 2023年河北共青团救灾照片争议事件

description.zh-cn: 指2023年8月，共青团河北省委及河北日报因挪用一张拍摄于2020年的旧闻图片来报道2023年京津冀暴雨灾情，而引发公众批评的事件。
description.en: Refers to the incident in August 2023 where the Hebei Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League and Hebei Daily were criticized by the public for using an old news photo taken in 2020 to report on the 2023 Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei floods.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党河北省委员会的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Hebei Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 2023年7月底在中国华北地区发生的一次严重暴雨灾害。
description.en: A severe rainstorm disaster that occurred in North China in late July 2023.

description.zh-cn: 2020年夏季在中国南方多地发生的严重洪涝灾害。
description.en: A series of severe floods that occurred in many parts of Southern China during the summer of 2020.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产主义青年团河北省委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据文本，中国共产主义青年团河北省委员会接受中国共产主义青年团中央委员会的领导。
description.en: According to the text, the Hebei Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League of China is under the leadership of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产主义青年团河北省委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党河北省委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据文本，中国共产主义青年团河北省委员会接受中国共产党河北省委员会的领导。
description.en: According to the text, the Hebei Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League of China is under the leadership of the Hebei Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产主义青年团河北省委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，李凡是中国共产主义青年团河北省委员会的书记。
description.en: According to the infobox, Li Fan is the Secretary of the Hebei Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League of China.

relationships.source: 2023年河北共青团救灾照片争议事件
relationships.target: 中国共产主义青年团河北省委员会

description.zh-cn: 因在新浪微博上发布关于2023年京津冀暴雨的虚假救灾照片而成为众矢之的，信誉受损，并最终撤下照片。
description.en: Became a target of public criticism for posting a fake disaster relief photo regarding the 2023 Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei floods on Sina Weibo, which damaged its credibility and led to the photo's removal.

relationships.source: 2023年河北共青团救灾照片争议事件

description.zh-cn: 因涉及发布关于2023年京津冀暴雨的虚假救灾照片而成为众矢之的，并为此公开道歉，声称“审核把关不严”，信誉受损。
description.en: Became a target of public criticism for its involvement in publishing a fake disaster relief photo regarding the 2023 Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei floods, and issued a public apology citing "lax review and gatekeeping," which damaged its credibility.

relationships.target: 2023年河北共青团救灾照片争议事件

description.zh-cn: 共青团河北省委及河北日报为报道2023年京津冀暴雨的救灾情况而发布信息，是此次照片作假争议的直接背景。
description.en: The Hebei Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League and Hebei Daily published information to report on the disaster relief efforts of the 2023 Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei floods, which served as the direct context for the photo fabrication controversy.

relationships.target: 2023年河北共青团救灾照片争议事件

description.zh-cn: 一张拍摄于2020年中国南方水灾期间、并由《人民日报》刊登的照片，在2023年被河北共青团挪用，引发了此次作假争议。
description.en: A photo taken during the 2020 China floods and published by the People's Daily was misappropriated in 2023 by the Hebei Communist Youth League, triggering the fabrication controversy.

description.zh-cn: 文本提及，2020年的暴雨导致太湖水位上涨。
description.en: The text mentions that the 2020 rainstorms caused the water level of Lake Tai to rise.
